directions: Place yogurt, feta, beans, garlic, and lemon juice in the bowl of your food processor and blend until smooth.  Add parsley, dill, chives, mint, and pepper; pulse until they are well combined. Transfer dip to serving bowl and chill until ready to serve.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed
title: Herbed Feta Dip
